simplified: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳

pronunciation.pinyin: yī zhāo bèi shé yǎo , shí nián pà jǐng shéng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 zhao1 bei4 she2 yao3 , shi2 nian2 pa4 jing3 sheng2

details.simplified: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳
details.traditional: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井繩

meanings.value: once bitten by a snake, ten years in fear of a well rope
